response.message: Joseph should be aware that fear of being struck by lightning is entirely rational.  Fear of being sucked up by a tornado and landing in Oz, however, is entirely irrational.  ('Cause that would be awesome!)

@SoboLAn Check out careers.stackoverflow.com/employer :)

@wax_eagle, and it's that hard to sell?!
Congrats new folks! Nice to see StackExchange is continuing to grow in leaps and bounds!!!

Seriously, y'all? We sell Careers!

Nice photos, congrats!
I'm curious whether there was specific reason to pick Denver? Geographic proximity of employees? Geographic proximity to potential customers? The view?

@Pekka: as a sales office, staffed primarily with people working one-on-one with folks looking to hire, Denver cuts the three-hour East Coast to West Coast time difference down to one hour, while being a significantly less expensive place to live and operate than major cities on either coast. Also, the view is rather nice.
What a good looking crew! Good luck in CO.
